description: A strong, refined brandy celebrated across the galaxy, best enjoyed in the high-speed cantinas of Corellia.
A murky, mysterious mix with herbal notes, as mysterious as the swamps of Dagobah itself.
A dark, potent sangria with deep red tones, as tempting as the path to the dark side.
This cocktail might not influence your thoughts, but it will certainly refresh them with its vibrant layers of flavor.
Rich and creamy, this iconic Tatooine beverage is famous for its bold blue color and sweet taste.
As fierce as the creature itself, this drink packs a punch with a fiery blend of spices and alcohol.
Smooth and suave, this sophisticated cocktail is as charming as Lando himself.
A refreshing cocktail designed to lift the spirits of any weary rebel after a long battle.
A fruity and forest-inspired drink, sweet and vibrant, perfect for celebration in any tree-top village.
A drink with a mix of light and dark, blending sweet and sour in a way that's as complex as the Skywalker saga.
